Class SocialNetworkGraph

java.lang.Object
SocialNetworkGraph
public class SocialNetworkGraph extends Object
Represents a social network graph where people can be added, removed, and friendships can be managed. It also provides functionalities to find the shortest path between two people, count clusters of friends, and suggest friends.

      Adds a person to the social network.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the person
      age - the age of the person
      hobbies - the list of hobbies of the person

    • removePerson

      public Person removePerson(String name)
      Removes a person from the social network.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the person to be removed
      Returns:
      the removed person, or null if the person was not found

      name2 - the name of the second person

    • findShortestPath

      public void findShortestPath(String startName, String endName)
      Finds the shortest path between two people using BFS.
      Parameters:
      startName - the name of the start person
      endName - the name of the end person

    • countClusters

      public void countClusters()
      Counts the number of clusters of friends using BFS.

    • suggestFriend

      public void suggestFriend(String name, int suggestNumber)
      Suggests friends for a person based on mutual friends and common hobbies.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the person
      suggestNumber - the number of friends to suggest

    • calculateScore

      public double[] calculateScore(Person person1, Person person2)
      Calculates the score for suggesting friends based on mutual friends and common hobbies.
      Parameters:
      person1 - the first person
      person2 - the second person
      Returns:
      an array with the score, number of mutual friends, and number of common hobbies
